attributes.action: remove or raise all speed limits.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If speed limits were removed you wouldn't drive at 100 mph through a town with cars parked on either side of the road just because you can.

Cars today are far more technologically advanced than even a few years ago, yet the motorway speed limit remains at 70.

A lack of speed limits would encourage safer driving because you would have to think about your speed, not check it every 2 seconds.

Those who do go too fast should be punished under dangerous driving, not an on the spot fine.

rejection.details:
There are several petitions already in existence:
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/EIGHTY/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
